resources.string: There are 50 states in the United States
Those who are not born in the US cannot become full citizens..
American citizens may expatriate, or voluntarily abandon their citizenship.
A child born on foreign soil whose parents are US citizens that have lived in the US, is automatically a US citizen.
While much attention is given to recent attempts to limit immigration to the US, our founders also found ways to push back against immigration.
The US currently sets no limit on the number of aliens that may enter the US, as long as those aliens enter legally.
Once an immigrant enters the US illegally they have no chance of ever becoming a legal resident.
It is a crime to knowingly hire an illegal alien.
